OVERVIEW DESCRIPTION Unable to display wbmp images on a WAP phone simulator when accessed via Tomcat3 DESCRIPTION Using Tomcat as a server/servlet engine on a Solaris host, combined with a serlvet, wml files and several WAP phone simulators (Nokia, UP, installed on a PC running NT Service Pack 5), attempts to display any .wbmp file (wireless bitmap) always result in the alternative text being displayed. However, when the same wbmp file is accessed on a host running Apache server, the image is displayed correctly on all the WAP phone simulators STEPS TO REPRODUCE 1) install Tomcat (jakarta-tomcat-3.2.1) on the selected host 2) install Apache Web server on an alternative host 3) install the Nokia WAP toolkit on a PC running NT with Service Pack 5; this should be installed with the WAP Server simulator selected int the device settings 4) Using Tomcat 3, point the WAP phone simulator to the following wml file (monica is a Solaris host):

5) Using Apache, point the WAP phone simulator to the following wml file (trafford is a solaris host):

ACTUAL RESULTS In step 4 above, Tomcat 3 is used to access the wml file containing an image ref link through a servlet. The alternative text (Logica) is always displayed on the WAP phone simulator In Step 5 above, Tomcat 3 is used to access a similar wml file, in which the image ref link is accessed via Apache. In this case the wbmp image is displayed on the WAP phone simulator EXPECTED RESULTS The image should be displayed on the WAP phone simulators and is so when accessed via Apache MIME CONFIGURATION We have tried various Mime extensions in the conf/web.xml file: image/vnd.wap.bmp image/vnd.wap.wbmp application/octet-stream BUT none of these appear to make any difference ADDITIONAL INFO The same problem appears to have been observed - See the last para in the Sun Forum discussion article, ref wbmp mime types: http://forum.java.sun.com/read/16789542/q_Ilu5fPI13wAAmB9#LR However, unable to locate anything similar in the Bugzilla bug database
